plot: A corridor. A young woman and a young man are sitting face to face. They glance at each other without saying a word. A door opens. It is their turn.
title: Vers où s'envolent les papillons...
plot_es: A corridor. A young woman and a young man are sitting face to face. They glance at each other without saying a word. A door opens. It is their turn.
plot_en: A corridor. A young woman and a young man are sitting face to face. They glance at each other without saying a word. A door opens. It is their turn.
